elements.name: LandingTitleHead
elements.html:
LP/GOLPP Survey 2026

Presented by LarParLife.org

elements.name: LandingIntroText01
elements.html: You're here because the disease of laryngeal paralysis (LarPar, LP) or Geriatric-Onset Laryngeal Paralysis and Polyneuropathy (GOLPP) has touched your life.

elements.name: LandingIntroText
elements.html: At the beginning of their LP/GOLPP journey, people often have more questions than answers. This survey has two modes: Survey Mode and Workbook Mode. Which mode you choose depends on how far long on your LP/GOLPP journey you are:

elements.name: LandingIntroText02
elements.html:
• Survey Mode collects information from people who are not new to the LP/GOLPP journey. If you want to share your experience, select Survey Mode.
  • In Workbook Mode you can browse the survey questions without making selections to help you learn about the choices you'll need to make as you move forward on your LP/GOLPP journey. If you're new to LP/GOLPP, select Workbook Mode

elements.name: LandingJourneyText
elements.html: In Survey Mode you'll be asked to remember details about your LP/GOLPP journey. If you find yourself answering 'Don't know' to many of the questions, you can switch to Workbook Mode to refresh your memory and continue later.

elements.name: LandingLosingCompanion
elements.html: We know how hard it is to lose one's beloved companion. If your companion has recently crossed over the Rainbow Bridge, maybe it's best to do the survey later when you've had time to heal.

elements.name: LandingAboutPrivacyHeading
elements.html: About your privacy and personal information

elements.name: LandingAboutPrivacyText01
elements.html: We're not asking for your last name, so we have no way to connect you with any of your private data. We need only four pieces of information to verify survey results:

elements.name: LandingAboutPrivacyText02
elements.html:
• Your first name
  • Your companion animal's name
  • The country in which you live
  • Your email address or Facebook account name

elements.name: LandingAboutPrivacyText02
elements.html: This information ensures that all the survey respondents are unique and verifiable without making them identifiable outside the context of the survey. For details about how we'll use the data we collect and further steps we'll take to anonymize your contact information, select the 'About your privacy' and 'Consent information' links.
